etomica.data.meter

Class MeterPressureHard

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataSourceScalar
      • etomica.data.meter.MeterPressureHard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource, DataSourceCollisional, IntegratorHard.CollisionListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataSourceWallPressure, MeterOsmoticPressure

    public class MeterPressureHard
extends DataSourceScalar
implements IntegratorHard.CollisionListener, DataSourceCollisional
    Meter for the pressure (given as the compressibility factor) of a hard potential. Performs sum of collision virial over all collisions, and manipulates value to obtain the compressibility factor, PV/NkT.

      Registers meter as a collisionListener to the integrator, and sets up a DataSourceTimer to keep track of elapsed time of integrator.
